question_stem: Varying levels of treatment were administered to a group of ill males and females, and their response to the illness was measured using a response variable. The scatterplot of the data is shown below, where shapes are used to distinguish gender. Which gender has a lower mean response?
question_stem_html: Varying levels of treatment were administered to a group of ill males and females, and their response to the illness was measured using a response variable. The scatterplot of the data is shown below, where shapes are used to distinguish gender. Which gender has a lower mean response?
